javadoc: An class to manage actions registered with the tool

methods.name: <init>

params.name: windowManager
params.comment:
manager of the "Docking" arrangement of a set of components 
        and actions in the tool

methods.javadoc:
Adds the action to the tool.
@param action the action to be added.
methods.name: addToolAction
methods.comment: Adds the action to the tool.

methods.javadoc:
Removes the given action from the tool
@param action the action to be removed.
methods.name: removeToolAction
methods.comment: Removes the given action from the tool

methods.javadoc:
Remove all actions that have the given owner.
@param owner owner of the actions to remove
methods.name: removeToolActions
methods.comment: Remove all actions that have the given owner.

params.name: owner
params.comment: owner of the actions to remove

methods.name: addLocalAction
methods.comment: Add an action that works specifically with a component provider.

methods.name: removeProviderAction
methods.comment: Remove an action that works specifically with a component provider.

methods.name: getDockingActionsByFullActionName
methods.comment: Get all actions that have the action name which includes the action owner's name.

return.comment: list of actions; empty if no action exists with the given name

methods.name: getActions
methods.comment: Get all actions for the given owner.

return.comment:
array of actions; zero length array is returned if no
 action exists with the given name

methods.javadoc:
Get a list of all actions in the tool.
@return list of PluginAction objects
methods.name: getAllActions
methods.comment: Get a list of all actions in the tool.

methods.javadoc:
Get the keybindings for each action so that they are still registered
 as being used; otherwise the options will be removed because they
 are noted as not being used.
methods.name: restoreKeyBindings
methods.comment:
Get the keybindings for each action so that they are still registered
 as being used; otherwise the options will be removed because they
 are noted as not being used.

methods.name: removeComponent
methods.comment:
Get the actions for the given provider and remove them from the
 actionMap; call the window manager to remove the provider.

name: DockingToolActionManager
comment: An class to manage actions registered with the tool
